query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `queryLogs` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `queryText` text NOT NULL,
  `executionTime` int NOT NULL,
  `tableName` varchar(100),
  `operationType` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `userId` int,
  `endpoint` varchar(200),
  `errorMessage` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `queryLogs_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `idx_execution_time` (`executionTime`),
  INDEX `idx_table_name` (`tableName`),
  INDEX `idx_created_at` (`createdAt`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `dbStatistics` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `tableName` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `rowCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `dataSize` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `indexSize` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `avgQueryTime` int,
  `queryCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `dbStatistics_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `idx_table_name` (`tableName`),
  INDEX `idx_created_at` (`createdAt`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `dbStatistics` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `tableName` varchar(100) NOT NULL,

  `indexSize` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,

  CONSTRAINT `dbStatistics_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `idx_table_name` (`tableName`),
  INDEX `idx_created_at` (`createdAt`)
);
